p: Following the execution of the search strategy, the identified items (titles and abstracts) were checked for duplication. Duplicates were removed. The unique items were then sorted according to type (e.g. articles, blogs, news articles, websites, etc.). The titles and abstracts of these unique items were then screened. Sources were excluded if 1) relevance to Kiribati was not sufficient; and 2) they were opinion pieces lacking empirical evidence.
